name: Locked in Battle
description:
"Locked In Battle" is a simple rhythm battle game.

The main character and his talking sword fight against monsters to regain his memory.

Language : Japanese / English (machine translated)

This game was created for the My First Game Jam Winter 2021.

--

“Locked In Battle”はシンプルなリズムバトルゲームです。 主人公と喋る刀が、記憶を取り戻すために妖怪と闘います。

このゲームは「My First Game Jam Winter 2021」の参加作品です。
